Title: Nigeria, Cameroon in play-offs as Africa confirms 9 for World Cup
Summary: Cape Verde, a tiny archipelago of about 550,000 inhabitants with no football, qualified for the 2026 World Cup in the United States, Canada and Mexico . Both Cape Verdesco and Ghana turned from zeros to heroes among supporters by qualifying this week .

Title: OPA slams Sowore over Kanu’s release call, says it insults victims of violence
Summary: Odua People’s Assembly (OPA) condemned what it described as a ‘provocative and insensitive’ campaign . Omoyele Sowore called for the unconditional release of the detained leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu .

Title: US Igbo group accuses Sowore, Atiku of politicising Kanu’s trial
Summary: US Igbo group accuses 2023 presidential candidates Omoyele Sowore and Atiku of politicising Kanu’s trial . They say the planned protest is a calculated attempt to politicise the trial of Kanu . The Free Nnamdi Kanu Now protest is scheduled for October 20 .

Title: Super Eagles to face Gabon in World Cup playoff
Summary: Nigeria’s Super Eagles will take on Gabon in the semi-finals of the CAF playoffs for the 2026 FIFA World Cup . The match is scheduled for Thursday, 13 November 2025, in Morocco . Gabon finished second in Group F with 25 goals .

Title: Burkina Faso, Mali, Niger juntas in online bid to disrupt Ivory Coast poll
Summary: Burkina Faso, Mali, Niger juntas in online bid to disrupt Ivory Coast's presidential election . Accounts linked to accounts linked to the junta have been posted online to disrupt the vote . The three other west African states have been waging a disinformation campaign .

Title: Don’t use Kanu’s release for your political ambitions, Northern youths warn Atiku, Sowore
Summary: Northern Nigeria Youth Leaders Forum (NNYLF) has warned former Vice President Atiku Abubakar and rights activist, Omoyele Sowore, against using detained IPOB leader, Nnamdi Kanu, to advance their political ambitions . This is contained in a statement by the National President of the association, Mr M

Title: Social media erupts as “iPhone XR to 17 Pro Max” saga grips Nigeria
Summary: The controversy started when entrepreneur Blord showcased a device he claimed was an iPhone XR transformed into an iPhone 17 Pro Max . The device is priced at ₦450,000 (plus delivery)

Title: Kenya president announces 7-day national mourning for Raila Odinga
Summary: Kenya president announces 7-day national mourning for Raila Odinga . Ruto said he would postpone all his public engagements in the coming days "as a mark of respect"

Title: Peter Mbah: Defection shopping will not help Tinubu in 2027  —  Ologunagba
Summary: Ologunagba argued that the Tinubu administration was using political defections to divert public attention from its failures . Peter Mbah: Defection shopping will not help in 2027 .

Title: S’East political realignment, a decisive step toward Nigeria’s unity, shared prosperity — APC
Summary: Lagos State Chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) described the ongoing political realignment in the South East as a development that underscores a new dawn of inclusion, vision, and national cohesion .
